text:
Is it not possible to add modules to a template page without them being in a section?
Edit: I see that I cropped away the `{% dnd_section` ; so the only place I get the module to display a module is to put it block -> dnd_area -> dnd_section

If I’m understanding what you’re trying to do correctly, you need to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/using-modules-in-templates|use the >`{% module %}`<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/using-modules-in-templates| tag> instead of the `{% dnd_module %}` tag, like so:
```{% module "testimonials" path="../modules/testimonails", testimonial="1111" %}```
